name: lucro-internship-portal
description: Full-stack internship management portal with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL

scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/node_modules admin-portal/node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/package-lock.json admin-portal/package-lock.json backend/package-lock.json
scripts.install-all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../admin-portal && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd admin-portal && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../admin-portal && npm run build
scripts.start: npm run setup-db && npm run install-all && npm run dev

author: Lucro Team
